mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_word(word_id, open_id, query, trans_src, trans_dst, from_word, to_word, status_code, create_time, last_edit_time, is_collection, is_delete) VALUE (#{wordId}, #{openId}, #{query}, #{transSrc}, #{transDst}, #{fromWord}, #{toWord}, #{statusCode}, #{createTime}, #{lastEditTime}, #{isCollection}, #{isDelete})
mapper.select: SELECT id, word_id, open_id, query, trans_src, trans_dst, from_word, to_word, status_code, create_time, last_edit_time, is_collection, is_delete FROM tb_word WHERE open_id=#{OpenId} AND is_delete='0' ORDER BY create_time DESC
